original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had said, and offered a bull and a ram on each altar.
korean_text: 발락이 발람의 말대로 행하여 각 제단에 수송아지와 숫양을 드리니라

sentences.original_text: And Balak did as Balaam had said
and offered a bull and a ram on each altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 제단 위에 수소와 수양을 바쳤습니다
